title: Real-time Anomaly Detection (Prod)
description: Streaming anomaly detection pipeline for monitoring server metrics using Spark, Kafka, and a custom model orchestration layer.

title: Customer Churn Model
description: End-to-end churn modelling with feature engineering, model explainability, and deployment as a REST API.

title: Sales Forecasting (time series)
description: Multi-horizon sales forecasting using Prophet and LSTM ensembles with uncertainty estimation and automated retraining.
